data.enText: to fix equipment or furniture into position so that it can be used
He's getting a phone installed tomorrow.

data.chText: 这家连锁旅馆最近安装了新的预订系统。
data.enText: The hotel chain has recently installed a new booking system.
to put a new program into a computer

data.chText: 我得找人帮忙安装这个软件。
data.enText: I'll need some help installing the software.
to put sb in a new position of authority, often with an official ceremony

data.chText: 他于去年五月份正式就任总统。
data.enText: He was installed as President last May.
to make sb/yourself comfortable in a particular place or position

data.chText: 我们舒舒服服地坐进了前排。
data.enText: We installed ourselves in the front row.

simple_means.memory_skill: in 进入 + stall 放 → 放入 → 安装

example: We put in a new sink
Her manager had set her up at the Ritz

tr: put into an office or a position
example: the new president was installed immediately after the election

value.def: If you install a piece of equipment, you fit it or put it somewhere so that it is ready to be used.

example.ex: They had installed a new phone line in the apartment.
example.tran: 他们已经在公寓里装上了新的电话线。

example.ex: Hundreds of lives could be saved if the installation of alarms was more widespread.
example.tran: 如果报警器得到更广泛的安装,成百上千的生命就可能被挽救。

value.def: If someone is installed in a new job or important position, they are officially given the job or position, often in a special ceremony.

example.ex: A new Catholic bishop was installed in Galway yesterday...
example.tran: 昨天在戈尔韦任命了一位新的天主教主教。

example.ex: Professor Sawyer was formally installed as President last Thursday...
example.tran: 索耶教授上周四被正式任命为校长。

example.ex: The army has promised to install a new government within a week.
example.tran: 军队已经许诺在一周内任命新一届政府。

example.ex: He sent a letter inviting Naomi to attend his installation as chief of his tribe.
example.tran: 他给娜奥米寄了封信,邀请她来参加他就任部落酋长的仪式。

value.def: If you install yourself in a particular place, you settle there and make yourself comfortable.

example.ex: Before her husband's death she had installed herself in a modern villa.
example.tran: 丈夫去世之前她已经在一所现代化别墅里安顿下来了。

partsOfSpeech.dec: fore 预先 + stall 放 → 预先放 → 预防
in 进入 + stall 放 → 放入 → 安装
install 安装；就职 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 安装；就职
install 安装；就职 + ment 表名词 → 放进 → 安装
